title: Metaverse Privacy, Shadow Docket, Musk vs. Twitter
itunes:title: Metaverse Privacy, Shadow Docket, Musk vs. Twitter
description:
Bloomberg Law Reporter Andrea Vittorio discusses the experiences technology companies are promising in the Metaverse and the privacy pitfalls that could come with its user data collection.

Stephen Vladeck, University of Texas at Austin Law professor, joins to talk about the Supreme Court's shadow docket and Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor’s refusal to block New York City’s Covid-19 vaccine mandate.

Jef Feeley, Legal Reporter for Bloomberg News, discusses Elon Musk and his fight to get out of the $44 billion Twitter deal.

Hosts: Lydia Wheeler and Kimberly Robinson Producer: Jack Halsted

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
